channel.title: The Party [Signups]
channel.description:
# Welcome to my party! Do take a seat..
This is a semi-game Roleplay
To signup, just fill out and post this character sheet.
> Name: (First and Last) > Gender: > Age: (18+) > General Appearance: > Unusual skill: > Unusual weakness: > Backstory: (Optional, fill this out if you want a more fleshed out role)
For example..
> Name: Jacob Daker > Gender: Male > Age: 23 > General Appearance: Pale skin, Blue eyes, and 5'6" > Unusual skill: Ability to survive much longer in cold environments. > Unusual weakness: Irrational fear of Ice > Backstory: Jacob Daker, the eldest son of Jake Daker, had a hard life. Born up in Alaska, he never liked the cold. He hated it. But his family was too poor to buy a heater, so he always had to deal with it. When his family moved down to a warmer climate, he was more than excited. His parents became the heirs to a large business and went from being nobodies to being the richest people in the area. Now, here he lives, on the Daker estate, where this very party is held.
# I hope you are all doing well. Please, do introduce yourselves. I am truly excited to see who we have today.
If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please post them below.
The Partygoers: 1 Marcus A. (Simon) 2 3 ...

item.title: The Party [Signups]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
screw the morning just got an idea so im typing this now

Name: Marcus Aveyerd
Gender: Male
Age: 19
General Appearance: quite wiry. pale. mop of black hair. 6’.
Unusual skill: Great at noticing details. can somewhat filter. Weirdly Great at looking at things, basically
Unusual weakness: Frail
Backstory: He does excersize. regularly. lotsa protein and other stuff to build muscle mass, and he is still quite thin. Perhaps the universe simply doesnt want him to be strong. perhaps he has some genetic disease eating away at him. The World May Never Know. As he spent a great deal of his life in a variety of Physical Therapy places, in a state where he could hardly move, He got good at getting a feel for an area. Once he could do that he started to try and notice some details, and work on putting them together. he could never really make that good of deductions, but the detail part of it continued to improve. eventually he was able to train his eyes and mind to sort of filter something so they can find what he’s looking for. Its quite vague, and it doesnt always work, but its a really neat trick to show at parties. Like this party for instance? perhaps, we just might see

this will be fun while waiting for the february Magnus Game.

Read full topic

item.title: The Party [Signups]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Welcome to my party! Do take a seat…

This is a semi-game Roleplay

To signup, just fill out and post this character sheet.

Name: (First and Last)
Gender:
Age: (18+)
General Appearance:
Unusual skill:
Unusual weakness:
Backstory: (Optional, fill this out if you want a more fleshed out role)

For example…

Name: Jacob Daker
Gender: Male
Age: 23
General Appearance: Pale skin, Blue eyes, and 5’6"
Unusual skill: Ability to survive much longer in cold environments.
Unusual weakness: Irrational fear of Ice
Backstory: Jacob Daker, the eldest son of Jake Daker, had a hard life. Born up in Alaska, he never liked the cold. He hated it. But his family was too poor to buy a heater, so he always had to deal with it. When his family moved down to a warmer climate, he was more than excited. His parents became the heirs to a large business and went from being nobodies to being the richest people in the area. Now, here he lives, on the Daker estate, where this very party is held.

I hope you are all doing well. Please, do introduce yourselves. I am truly excited to see who we have today.

If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please post them below.

The Partygoers:
1 Marcus A. (Simon)
2
3
…

Read full topic
